translation.en: No better way to celebrate the first day of summer than a beach day!
translation.it: Festeggiare l'inizio dell'estate al mare è il massimo.

translation.en: Got the sun on my face and sand between my toes.
translation.it: Il sole in faccia e i piedi nella sabbia.

translation.en: Ooh, now that's what I call a sand castle!
Thanks! I'm about to start building an even bigger one!
translation.it: Grazie. Voglio costruirne uno più grande,

translation.en: Eat that ice pop slowly, or you'll get…
translation.it: Se mangi il ghiacciolo in fretta…

translation.en: [chuckles] So much for fun in the sun.
My beam alert's picking up on suspicious activity in the area.
translation.it: L'allarme Beam ha rilevato delle attività sospette.

translation.en: This super sunny day needs a super funny prank.
translation.it: Questa giornata di sole ha bisogno di uno scherzo divertente!

translation.en: Let's get this beach party started with a super special switcheroo. Joke's on you!
translation.it: Movimentiamo la festa in spiaggia. Le cose inverto, così mi diverto!

translation.en: That can only mean one thing.
[sighs] So much for our perfect beach day, kids.
We better find her before she pulls any more seaside shenanigans.
translation.it: Troviamola prima che combini altri guai.

translation.en: And I'm kinda liking this snail thing.
translation.it: E non mi dispiacciono le lumache.
Le cose inverto, così mi diverto.

translation.en: Um, Henry, why are you showing me a picture of a snail… Jumping Geehosofat!
translation.it: Henry, perché mi fai vedere la foto di una lumaca!

translation.en: Tricksy, wherever you are, you switch my Gramps back right now!
translation.it: Tricksy! Ovunque tu sia, metti subito mio nonno a posto!

translation.en: That's some prime fun-in-the-sun pranking right there!
translation.it: È uno scherzo da spiaggia divertente.

translation.en: Don't worry, Gramps. We'll find Tricksy and bring her back.
translation.it: Va in città! Tranquillo, Nonnino. La troveremo e le faremo uno scherzo.
La troveremo e le faremo uno scherzo.

translation.en: You can definitely use a boost!
What do we do with Gramps?
Don't worry, I've got you covered.
[sighs] I'm getting too old for this.
Nothing like a little summertime switcherooin', eh, Wanda?
translation.it: Niente di meglio di uno scambio estivo, eh, Wanda?
Le cose inverto, così mi diverto!

translation.en: Come on, Mr. Pickles. Jump, I'll catch you!
translation.it: Dai, Pickles! Salta! Ti prendo io.

translation.en: Hey, Wanda. Let's really have some fun. Switcheroo, Joke's on you!
translation.it: Ehi, Wanda, divertiamoci un po'. Le cose inverto, così mi diverto!

translation.en: Oh, boy. [chuckles] Who knew being a snail could be so exciting?
translation.it: Santo cielo. Essere una lumaca è divertente.

translation.en: [Boost] I think I'm on to something.
I'm tracking flowing activity on the boardwalk. It's…
She was up in the tree.
translation.it: Era sull'albero e poi qui giù,

translation.en: Then she was suddenly down here, and then she took off.
translation.it: Era sull'albero e poi qui giù, poi è scappata!

translation.en: Don't worry, I'll save her. Can you keep a close eye on Stella for me?
translation.it: Tranquillo. La salvo io. Tu tieni d'occhio Stella.

translation.en: I've always wanted to be a goat. So cool.
translation.it: Ho sempre voluto essere una capra. Forte!

translation.en: Yeah! Not only am I a goat, but I'm flying with StarBeam!
translation.it: Sì! Non solo sono una capra, ma volo pure con StarBeam!

translation.en: This is the best day ever!
Hey, everyone! Did you see that?
I just got rescued by StarBeam.
translation.it: Sono appena stata salvata da StarBeam!
Piacere mio. Svelta! Tricksy è sul lungomare!

translation.en: We found Tricksy on the boardwalk!
I'm on my way. I gotta go.
translation.it: Arrivo. Devo andare, presto le cose torneranno normali.

translation.en: But hopefully, things will be back to normal soon.
translation.it: Devo andare, presto le cose torneranno normali.

translation.en: [giggles] Nice try, but you can't catch me!
translation.it: Bel tentativo, ma non mi prenderete!

translation.en: Okay, so it turns out, pixies are even harder to catch than I thought.
translation.it: Ok. I folletti sono difficili da catturare.

translation.en: We have to find Tricksy, so we can prank her and get everything switched back.
translation.it: Dobbiamo fare uno scherzo a Tricksy per sistemare le cose.

translation.en: -We just have to, or, or… -[Gramps] StarBeam.
translation.it: Dobbiamo o… StarBeam, andrà tutto bene.

translation.en: Remember what we do in times like these?
Take a moment, take a breath. Make a plan and try your best! [sighs]
translation.it: Fermati un attimo a respirare e vedrai che saprai cosa fare.

translation.en: If we can't find Tricksy, we'll make her come to us.
translation.it: Se non troviamo Tricksy, la faremo venire da noi!

translation.en: Tricksy loves being around fun more than anything, right?
So all we have to do is have tons of fun…
And she'll come right to us!
Thanks, Gramps. What would I ever do without you?
translation.it: Grazie, Nonnino. Cosa farei senza di te?

translation.en: [chuckles] No worries. I'll be back to my huggable self before you know it.
Hey, Boost, how do you catch a squirrel?
What falls in the winter but never gets hurt? Snow!
translation.it: Cosa cade in inverno, ma non si fa male? La neve!

translation.en: You know, we might have been a little hard on you earlier.
translation.it: Prima siamo stati troppo duri con te.

translation.en: That was a pretty amazing switcheroo you pulled off.
Yeah! No one can switcheroo like you.
translation.it: Sì! Nessuno sa invertire cose come te.

translation.en: [sighs] There's plenty more where that came from.

translation.it: A proposito, bel castello di sabbia.

translation.en: Thanks, you should see the inside.

translation.it: Sì! Ci siamo dati da fare.

translation.en: It's got a beach glass dance floor in the ballet parlor!
translation.it: C'è la sala da ballo con la pista in vetro.

translation.en: And a breezy master bedroom, with a beautiful view of the bay!
translation.it: Una camera da letto con una splendida vista della baia!

translation.en: You know, after a busy day of tricking people,
translation.it: Sai, dopo una giornata piena di scherzi,

translation.en: I really could use a good soak.

translation.it: La sala da ballo è fantastica!
Le cose inverti, così ti diverti.

translation.en: I think this is our best adventure yet.
